data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: The perfume shop was busy.  I couldn't decide on which aftershave to buy for my husband; petrol or diesel.  Thankfully, testers were available.  Petrol aroma was quite earthy, whilst Diesel had a floral undertone. But wait - what is this delightful smell?.. Pump!  Definitely the right choice for my husband!

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: I open the letter in anticipation,  would it be good or bad news.  I read and re-read the words slowly.  We've done it!!  I stamp my feet in approval.  Excited, I send message to my husband, telling him the good news.

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: Sadness fills the air, as we walk around the 911 memorial site.  We enter the church, complying with their rules.  The organ is being played and the mood is sombre.   The Empire state building will be a welcome treat later today.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: With despair, I ask my husband how can we exist on so little money, The payment to the tax office has taken so much of our money already.  Not only this, but there is a chill in the air.  Winter is approaching with it bringing the doom and gloom of high energy bills.
